title: 8/8/17 - Could you stop using Google if you had to? (Dinesh D'Souza joins Glenn)
description:
Should a company fire an outspoken employee? ...Google tries to fix discrimination with discrimination ...Glenn tries to explain liberals ...Charlie Gard's final moments ...The parents of Bubby Cruzan discuss his fight with the same condition as Charlie Gard ...Staying positive in the face of big struggles ...Dinesh D'Souza joins Glenn to talk about his new book "The Big Lie" and the left's deep connection with the roots of Nazism ...

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
